appetizer.name: Classic ratatouille
appetizer.description: This moreish Mediterranean-style vegetable stew is perfect for a super-healthy midweek supper

appetizer.name: Silky squash risotto
appetizer.description: Slow-roasted sweet squash, aromatic marjoram and nutty Parmesan come together to create this oozy, cheesy, sumptuous risotto that’s packed with glorious flavour.

appetizer.name: quiche traybake
appetizer.description: This genius veggie quiche traybake takes the hassle out of making quiche from scratch.

appetizer.name: Glazed carrots
appetizer.description: I love doing carrots like this, as the simple flavour combination teamed with the clever cooking technique gives you something that makes you go wow. Carrots are sometimes seen as everyday, but not here – these bad boys are special.

appetizer.name: Brussels sprouts
appetizer.description: Celebrate the humble sprout with this insanely delicious recipe. Crisp cubes of apple provide beautiful sweetness, while sausage – and Worcestershire sauce (my secret ingredient) – gives a contrasting savoury kick. Serve straight from the pan or make ahead and crisp it all up in the oven on the big day – both ways work!

dessert.name: Strawberry tarte tatin
dessert.description: Light, golden puff pastry with soft juicy fruit and crisp caramel is a brilliant combination. Serve with a scoop of ice cream for the perfect contrast to this warm, sticky pud

dessert.name: smoothie ice lollies
dessert.description: Summer desserts don’t get much better than this fruity little number – blitz up a batch and leave in the freezer ready for when the sun shines.

dessert.name: Chocolate & banana French toast
dessert.description: Here’s my beautiful twist on French toast. This could be the most amazing breakfast or brunch, or even turned into dessert with a little scoop of ice cream. Either way, it’s a brilliant thing to make for the one you love, so what are you waiting for?

dessert.name: Drizzle bundt cake
dessert.description: TAHINI & YOGHURT SPONGE, POMEGRANATE & ROSE WATER DRIZZLE, PISTACHIO DUST

beef.name: A cracking burger
beef.description: Serve this really tasty, easy homemade burger recipe with your favourite toppings.

beef.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
beef.description: This ultimate pasta recipe is a total classic, delicious, and super-easy to knock together

beef.name: beef bourguignon
beef.description: BURGUNDY, BACON, BUTTON MUSHROOMS & BABY ONIONS

beef.name: Roasted rump steak
beef.description: This meal is such a fantastic reimagining of steak and chips. It allows us to truly enjoy and celebrate the rump cut as a bigger joint, and as the oven does the hard work for you, all the last-minute smoke and stress is removed from the process. This piece of steak is slightly bigger than you need, but it cooks well at this size and is worth it for the leftovers.

soups.name: Minestrone soup
soups.description: This hearty and nutritious minestrone soup is brilliant at embracing what you’ve got

soups.name: Spiced parsnip soup
soups.description: There’s something wonderfully comforting about a nice bowl of soup. I’ve served this one with some quick, funky parsnip crisps, garam masala and a swirl of yoghurt and chilli oil. Delicious

soups.name: tomato soup
soups.description: The basil oil brings this simple, comforting soup to life – along with some alphabet pasta and a cheeky layer of grated cheese!

soups.name: Korean chicken hotpot
soups.description: This rich and earthy chicken soup packs a proper punch – it's seriously good.

soups.name: Hot & sour chicken broth
soups.description: Wonderfully warming and delicious, this punchy broth is simple to make – it's the perfect pick-me-up on a chilly day

fishMeals.name: Malaysian-style whole fish
fishMeals.description: It’s really worth sourcing a banana leaf for this spectacular Friday Night sea bass dish. Incredible fragrance, amplified flavour and wonderful texture – it’s a real belter!

fishMeals.name: Tuna mapo tofu
fishMeals.description: Mapo tofu is one of my favourite dishes. The spicy Sichuan ingredients mixed with the minerality and richness of the tuna and the creaminess of the tofu is such a good match

fishMeals.name: Epic avo & trout on toas
fishMeals.description: This fresh-flavoured open-style sandwich is a thing of beauty – perfect for lunch on a sunny day.

fishMeals.name: Sri Lankan fish curry
fishMeals.description: Cricket super-fan and actor Stephen Mangan’s love of the game has seen him journey to far-flung corners of the Indian Ocean, so I’ve cooked up a traditional Sri Lankan dish to remind him of his travels. It’s a deliciously dry curry, with all the flavour coming from the paste. I’m serving it with an easy yet super-tasty yellow rice and a gorgeously fresh coconut sambal – give it a go!

fishMeals.name: Seared tuna steak
fishMeals.description: When buying tuna you should look for meat that is evenly coloured, dark red and has a fine, tight grain free of large sinews

grill.name: Tahini BBQ lamb
grill.description: WITH FRESH PLUMS AND SPICED PLUM SAUCE

grill.name: Saganaki lamb skewers
grill.description: Saganaki lamb skewers with pickled cabbage

grill.name: marinated mozzarella
grill.description: Gooey grilled cheese, crispy bacon, crusty bread – what a combo! This is one genius bbq recipe

grill.name: Gorgeous rosemary prune skewers
grill.description: These fragrant kebabs are one of those barbecue recipes you'll keep coming back to again and again

grill.name: Black & blushing
grill.description: This is the most delicious barbecued beef I think I’ve ever had (even if I say so myself). Trust me because it’s going to go really dark and look burnt, but it’ll be perfect inside if you do it right.

drinkables.name: Creamy Guinness cocktail
drinkables.description: This simple Guinness cocktail is a riff on a Guinness punch – it’s like a boozy, rich Baileys

drinkables.name: Pink pepper negroni
drinkables.description: With a kickin' peppery punch, this super-charged festive negroni is a must-try Christmas cocktail.

drinkables.name: Manhattan
drinkables.description: This is an absolute classic. I make a big batch of this before a party, then pour into chilled martini glasses and garnish as the guests arrive. You don't need to make many though!

drinkables.name: Mulled wine
drinkables.description: Mulled wine, also known as spiced wine, is an alcoholic drink usually made with red wine

drinkables.name: Christmas pudding vodka
drinkables.description: Make festive cocktails with this spicy vodka
